paper_abstract: In this paper, we approximate homomorphisms in non-Archimedean C*-algebras and non-Archimedean Lie C*-algebras and of derivations on non-Archimedean C*-algebras and non-Archimedean Lie C*-algebras for the following Jensen type functional equation f(x+y/2) + f(x-y/2) = f(x).
paper_title: APPROXIMATION OF THE JENSEN TYPE FUNCTIONAL EQUATION IN NON-ARCHIMEDEAN C*-ALGEBRAS
